arts.ttl: ‘JUST GOT A FEELING’: CHRIS SUTTON PREDICTS OUTCOME OF EVERTON VS BRIGHTON
arts.sum: Pundit Chris Sutton has predicted the outcome of Everton v Brighton on Sunday afternoon. David Moyes’ side welcome the Seagulls to the Hill Dickinson Stadium in what will be an historic day for Everton. Competitive football will be played at our new stadium for the first time. After the final test event against AS Roma, Premier League football will be played at the Bramley-Moore Dock on Sunday.
